name: PUNK-EX
description:
PUNK-EX

PUNK ex is a fasted-paced Land, Air and Space shooter with more than 30+ single-player missions.

'BOOM' a ex-professor seeking revenge for his dead family that is killed by the 'Snakers', a extraterrestrial beings from a parallel universe of Gaia.
Main Features
  • Land, Space and Aerial Battlefield in a alien environment.
  • More than 30 missions.
  • Collect and harvest eggs to build your own underlings to fight with you.
  • Build AI & Robots to assist you during battle.
  • Different variety of missions include destroying key targets. protecting key targets and challenge courses.
  • Varieties of enemy types and Bosses
  • A Sci-fi adventure story focusing on Parallel Universe.
  • Co-op missions.
  • PVP (player vs player) mode

PUNK-EX will be coming out on Early-Access in late 2018. Add the game to your wishlists to get the latest status of the game.
